TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpRuntimeSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class HttpRuntimeSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置 ASP.NET HTTP 运行时。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET HTTP runtime.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使你可以处理这些参数影响的 ASP.NET 运行时的行为。The allows you to handle those parameters that affect the behavior of the ASP.NET runtime. 它指由该元素指示，并可在配置层次结构中的任何级别的配置文件中的节点。It refers to the node in the configuration file that is indicated by the element and can be used at any level in the configuration hierarchy. 部分包含管理以下指令：The section contains directives that manage the following: - 请求执行超时。Request execution timeouts. - 为线程安排在应用程序级别的指令。Directives to thread scheduling at the application level. - 控制应用程序队列限制的指令。Directives that govern application queue limits. - 请求长度。Request length. 当在单个进程中运行多个应用程序，你应锁定此节，以便应用程序到另一个不能提升其相对优先级。When running more than one application in a single process, you should lock down this section so that applications cannot elevate their relative priority to one another.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用默认设置初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default settings.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether application apartment threading is enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用应用程序单元线程处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if application apartment threading is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AppRequestQueueLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 为应用程序排入队列的最大请求数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum number of requests that ASP.NET queues for the application.

value.span: 队列中允许的最大请求数。

span.span: The maximum number of requests that can be queued.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在没有足够的自由线程处理它们，ASP.NET 将请求排队。ASP.NET queues requests when there are not enough free threads to process them. > [!NOTE] > 如果排队的请求数超过了此设置指定的限制，将拒绝传入的请求，并"503-服务器太忙"错误。When the number of requests queued exceeds the limit imposed by this setting, incoming requests will be rejected with a "503 - Server Too Busy" error. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#16)]

span.span: Gets or sets the mode of the request entity that is asynchronously preloaded.

value.span: 请求实体的模式。

span.span: The mode of the request entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性必须之前设置设置 ASP.NET 管道中。This property must to be set before is set in the ASP.NET pipeline.

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time that a regular expression is allowed in order to perform a match.

value.span: 允许正则表达式匹配的时间。

span.span: The time that is allowed for regular-expression matching.

span.span: Gets or sets the change notification delay.

value.span: 以秒为单位的时间，指定更改通知的延迟时间。

span.span: The time, in seconds, that specifies the change notification delay.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以解决在将信息写回扫描的文件中，通过设置时，某些防病毒应用程序，所引起的问题属性。You can address the problem caused by some antivirus applications, when writing information back to the scanned files, by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 因为无法从用户所做的区分导致防病毒扫描的文件更改，将出现问题。The problem occurs because file changes caused by antivirus scanning cannot be distinguished from the ones made by the user. 最终结果是正在扫描其文件的应用程序重新启动。The end result is the restart of the application whose files are being scanned. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the application domain is enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用该应用程序域，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application domain is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此设置会影响应用程序域或在当前节点级别上和更低版本的域。This setting affects the application domain or domains at the current node level and below. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableHeaderChecking { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用了标头检查。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header checking is enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用该标头检查，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the header checking is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的目的是能够进行编码的回车符和换行符，`\r`和`\n`，响应标头中。The purpose of this property is to enable encoding of the carriage return and newline characters, `\r` and `\n`, that are found in response headers. 在出站响应标头，由代码 0x1F 表示和下面进行编码的字符以及字符 0x7F （删除字符）。In outbound response headers, the characters that are represented by the codes 0x1F and below are encoded and also the character 0x7F (delete character). 唯一的例外是字符为 0x09 （制表符） 是未修改。The only exception is that the character 0x09 (the tab character) is unmodified. 这种编码有助于避免注入攻击利用回显标头中包含的不受信任的数据的应用程序。This encoding can help to avoid injection attacks that exploit an application that echoes untrusted data contained by the header. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不适用于状态行本身 （状态代码和状态说明），但应适用于其他标头。This property does not apply to the status line itself (status code and status description), but should apply to other headers. 虽然可在任何级别设置，此属性在计算机和应用程序级别才适用。Although can be set at any level, this property is only applicable at the machine and application level. 当此属性是`true`，这是默认设置，`\r`或`\n`响应标头中找到的字符编码为`%0d`和`%0a`。When this property is `true`, which is the default, the `\r` or `\n` characters found in a response header are encoded to `%0d` and `%0a`. 这会使相同的标头行的插入材料部分，从而背道而驰标头注入式攻击。This defeats header-injection attacks by making the injected material part of the same header line. 这可能会破坏响应，但会打不开对客户端的攻击媒介。This might break the response but should not open attack vectors against the client. 回显不受信任的数据没有在任何情况下，一个好主意但。Echoing back untrusted data is never a good idea in any situation, though. > [!IMPORTANT] > HTTP 标头继续依赖于跨越多个行的标头和需要中的有新行。HTTP header continuations rely on headers spanning multiple lines and require new lines in them. 如果你需要使用标头延续，则需要设置属性`false`。If you need to use header continuations, you need to set the property to `false`. 由于没有对性能有影响查看标头，如果您确信已经执行了适当的检查，则关闭此功能可以提高你的应用程序的性能。Because there is a performance impact from looking at headers, if you are certain you are already doing the right checks, turning off this feature can improve the performance of your application. 禁用此功能之前，请确保在此区域中已采用正确的预防措施。Before you disable this feature, be sure you are already taking the right precautions in this area. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableKernelOutputCache { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用了输出缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether output caching is enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用输出缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if output caching is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要缓存的响应，需要满足以下条件：In order to cache a response, the following criteria need to be met: - 必须通过页指令或 caching API 显式启用缓存。Caching must be explicitly enabled by a page directive or by the caching API. - 缓存必须具有过期策略，以便内核知道何时放弃它。Caching must have an expiration policy so that the kernel knows when to discard it. - 缓存不能具有任何可变标头或参数。Caching cannot have any variable headers or parameters. - 请求必须不需要任何身份验证。The request must not require any authentication. > [!NOTE] > 仅当安装 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 6.0 或更高版本时，此属性是相关。This property is relevant only when Internet Information Services (IIS) version 6.0 or later is installed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableVersionHeader { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 是否应输出版本标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether ASP.NET should output a version header.

value.span: 如果启用版本标头的输出，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the output of the version header is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性由 Visual Studio 用于确定哪个版本的 ASP.NET 正在使用中。This attribute is used by Visual Studio to determine which version of ASP.NET is in use. 它不是生产站点必需的并且可以被禁用。It is not necessary for production sites and can be disabled. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EncoderType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可用于处理 HTML 和 URL 编码的自定义类型的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a custom type that can be used to handle HTML and URL encoding.

value.span: 可用于处理 HTML 和 URL 编码的类型的名称。

span.span: The name of a type that can be used to handle HTML and URL encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用为 HTML 和 URL 编码任务的默认处理程序的类型。ASP.NET uses the type as the default handler for HTML and URL encoding tasks. 若要自定义编码的行为，可以创建继承自的类类型。To customize encoding behavior, you can create a class that inherits from the type. 在应用程序配置文件中，你将属性`httpRuntime`到自定义类型的完全限定的字符串名称的元素。In the configuration file for an application, you then set the attribute of the `httpRuntime` element to the fully qualified string name of the custom type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ExecutionTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置请求的允许执行时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the allowed execution time for the request.

value.span: 一个 值，指示请求的允许执行时间。

span.span: A value that indicates the allowed execution time for the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示最大请求是否允许在 ASP.NET 自动关闭之前执行的秒数。The property indicates the maximum number of seconds a request is allowed to execute before being automatically shut down by ASP.NET. 默认值为 110 秒。The default is 110 seconds. 此超时仅适用于元素中的调试属性设置为`false`。This time-out applies only if the debug attribute in the element is set to `false`. 如果超时过期被引发异常。If the time-out expires an exception is raised. 你可以在应用程序文件夹中的事件日志中记录的相关的信息。You can record the related information in the Application folder of the Event Log. 通过启用应用程序运行状况监视配置元素中执行此操作。You do this by enabling the application health monitoring in the configuration element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#10)]

exception.span: 请求执行时间超过了执行超时值设置的限制值。

span.span: The request execution time exceeded the limit set by the execution time-out.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::FcnMode FcnMode { System::Web::Configuration::FcnMode get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::FcnMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指定文件更改通知模式的枚举值。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value specifying the file change notifications mode.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxQueryStringLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 HTTP 请求中查询字符串的最大可能长度，以字符数表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum possible length, in number of characters, of a query string in an HTTP request.

value.span: 查询字符串的最大长度，以字符数表示。

span.span: The maximum length of the query string, in number of characters.

value.span: 默认值为 2048。

span.span: The default is 2048.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性可以是任意整数，零或更大。The value of the property can be any integer, zero or larger. 如果查询字符串的长度将超过大小限制，ASP.NET 返回`HTTP 400`（错误请求） 状态代码。If the length of a query string exceeds the size limit, ASP.NET returns an `HTTP 400` (Bad Request) status code. > [!NOTE] > 极小的值可以使网站不可用。Extremely small values can make a Web site unusable. 你可以配置文件中设置此值，通过设置`maxQueryStringLength`属性`httpRuntime`元素。You can set this value in a configuration file by setting the `maxQueryStringLength` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369). > [!NOTE] > 此外，还有控制查询字符串长度的 IIS 设置。There is also an IIS setting that controls query string length. 请参阅`maxQueryString`属性中[请求限制\](http://www.iis.net/ConfigReference/system.webServer/security/requestFiltering/requestLimits)。See the `maxQueryString` attribute in [Request Limits \](http://www.iis.net/ConfigReference/system.webServer/security/requestFiltering/requestLimits).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxRequestLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置请求的最大大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum request size.

value.span: 请求的最大大小（以千字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum request size in kilobytes.

value.span: 默认大小为 4096 KB (4 MB)。

span.span: The default size is 4096 KB (4 MB).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的输入流缓冲阈值限制。The property specifies the limit for the buffering threshold of the input stream. 例如，可以使用此限制，以防止拒绝服务攻击而引起发送到服务器的大型文件的用户。For example, this limit can be used to prevent denial of service attacks that are caused by users who post large files to the server. 分配给此属性的值应大于或等于分配给值属性。The value assigned to this property should be greater or equal to value assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取当前属性值。The following example shows how to obtain the current property value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#19)]

span.span: The selected value is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxUrlLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 HTTP 请求中 URL 的最大可能长度，以字符数表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum possible length, in number of characters, of the URL in an HTTP request.

value.span: URL 的长度，以字符数表示。

span.span: The length of the URL, in number of characters.

value.span: 默认值为 260。

span.span: The default is 260.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性可以是任意整数，零或更大。The value of the property can be any integer, zero or larger. > [!NOTE] > 极小的值可以使网站不可用。Extremely small values can make a Web site unusable. 如果请求 URL 的长度 (即的值属性) 超过了配置的大小限制，ASP.NET 会返回 HTTP 400 （错误请求） 状态代码If the length of the request URL (which is the value of the property) exceeds the configured size limit, ASP.NET returns an HTTP 400 (Bad Request) status code 你可以配置文件中设置此值，通过设置属性`httpRuntime`元素。You can set this value in a configuration file by setting the attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxWaitChangeNotification { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置从第一次更改通知到应用程序域重新启动之间的时间间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the time interval between the first change notification and the time at which the application domain is restarted.

value.span: 从第一次更改通知到应用程序域重新启动之间的最大时间间隔（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The maximum time interval, in seconds, from the first change notification and the time when the application domain is restarted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的值属性将超过的总时间，在部署过程中完成复制。A suggested value for the property would exceed the length of time to complete a copy during the deployment process. > [!NOTE] > 如果在复制和部署过程之后立即查看它，则可能会出现缓存内容。The content might appear cached if you view it immediately after a copy-and-deploy process. 这是典型的行为。This is typical behavior. 在你指定的等待期限过后，所做的更改生效。The changes take effect when the wait period that you specified has elapsed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinFreeThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在能够为此配置范围中的资源请求提供服务之前必须存在的最小自由线程数。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of threads that must be free before a request for resources in this configuration scope can be serviced.

value.span: 在此配置范围中的请求得到服务之前，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 线程池中的最小自由线程数。

span.span: The minimum number of free threads in the common language runtime (CLR) thread pool before a request in this configuration scope will be serviced.

value.span: 默认值是8。

span.span: The default value is 8.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义的最小自由线程执行的请求数。The property defines the minimum number of free threads to execute a request. 如果足够数量的线程不可用，请求将保持排队状态，并定期检查线程可用性将继续，直到所需的数量的线程都存在。If a sufficient number of threads are not available, the request will remain queued and periodic checks for thread availability will continue until the required amount of threads are present. 默认值为 `8`。The default value is `8`. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 保留这么多线程可用对于需要其他线程完成其处理请求。ASP.NET keeps this many threads free for requests that require additional threads to complete their processing. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinLocalRequestFreeThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为本地请求提供服务所需要的最小自由线程数。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of free threads required to service a local request.

value.span: 分配给本地请求的最小自由线程数。

span.span: The minimum number of free threads assigned to local requests.

value.span: 默认值为 4。

span.span: The default value is 4.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义 ASP.NET 保留的可用来允许执行新的本地请求的自由线程数。The property defines the number of free threads that ASP.NET keeps available to allow execution of new local requests. 其目的是避免因递归重新可能的死锁到 Web 服务器。The intent is to avoid a possible deadlock with recursive reentry into the Web server. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
public: property bool RelaxedUrlToFileSystemMapping { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 HTTP 请求中的 URL 是否必须为有效的 Windows 文件路径。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the URL in an HTTP request is required to be a valid Windows file path.

value.span: 如果该 URL 不必符合 Windows 路径规则，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the URL does not have to comply with Windows path rules; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定将如何验证传入的 HTTP 请求中的 URL。The property determines how the URL in an incoming HTTP request will be validated. 如果此属性为`false`，URL 验证使用相同的规则，以确定 Windows 文件系统路径是否有效。If this property is `false`, the URL is validated by using the same rules that determine whether a Windows file system path is valid. 你可以配置文件中设置此值，通过设置属性`httpRuntime`元素。You can set this value in a configuration file by setting the attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RequestLengthDiskThreshold { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置输入流缓冲阈值。

span.span: Gets or sets the input-stream buffering threshold.

value.span: 指示输入流缓冲阈值的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes that indicate the input-stream buffering threshold.

value.span: 默认值为 80 千字节。

span.span: The default is 80 kilobytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性中的字节数指定输入流缓冲阈值限制。The property specifies the input-stream buffering threshold limit in number of bytes. 其值不应超过属性值。Its value should not exceed the property value. 请求实体超过此阈值后，它是以透明方式缓冲到磁盘。After a request entity exceeds this threshold, it is buffered transparently onto disk. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#12)]

span.span: The selected value is greater than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RequestPathInvalidCharacters { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符列表，这些字符在 HTTP 请求包含的路径中指定为无效字符。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of characters that are specified as invalid in a path that is part of an HTTP request.

value.span: 一个以逗号分隔的无效字符列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of invalid characters.

value.span: 以下列表包含默认的无效字符集：

span.span: The following list contains the default set of invalid characters:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在配置文件中设置此值，你可以分配到的字符的逗号分隔字符串`requestPathInvalidCharacters`属性`httpRuntime`元素。To set this value in a configuration file, you can assign a comma-separated string of characters to the `requestPathInvalidCharacters` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Version ^ RequestValidationMode { Version ^ get(); void set(Version ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个版本号，该版本号指示将使用哪种 ASP.NET 版本特定的验证方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a version number that indicates which ASP.NET version-specific approach to validation will be used.

value.span: 一个值，指示将使用哪种 ASP.NET 版本特定的验证方法。

span.span: A value that indicates which ASP.NET version-specific approach to validation will be used.

value.span: 默认值是4.5。

span.span: The default is 4.5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定将使用哪种 ASP.NET 的验证方法。The property specifies which ASP.NET approach to validation will be used. 这可以是 ASP.NET 的版本早于版本 4 或在中使用的版本中使用的算法[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]。This can be the algorithm that is used in versions of ASP.NET earlier than version 4, or the version that is used in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]. 属性可以设置为以下值：The property can be set to the following values: - `4.5 (the default).` 在此模式下，延迟加载值，即它们不读取它们请求之前。`4.5 (the default).` In this mode, values are lazily loaded, that is, they are not read until they are requested. - `4.0` 对象内部设置一个标志，指示在访问任何 HTTP 请求数据时，应触发请求验证。`4.0` The object internally sets a flag that indicates that request validation should be triggered whenever any HTTP request data is accessed. 这保证了数据，例如 cookie 之前触发请求验证，并在请求过程中访问 Url。This guarantees that the request validation is triggered before data such as cookies and URLs are accessed during the request. 会忽略请求验证设置的配置文件中的元素 （如果有） 或单个页面中的指令。The request validation settings of the element (if any) in the configuration file or of the directive in an individual page are ignored. - `2.0`。`2.0`. 仅对页面，未对所有 HTTP 请求启用请求验证。Request validation is enabled only for pages, not for all HTTP requests. 此外，使用请求验证设置的配置文件中的元素 （如果有） 或单个页面中的指令来确定哪一页要验证的请求。In addition, the request validation settings of the element (if any) in the configuration file or of the directive in an individual page are used to determine which page requests to validate. 你将分配给此属性的值不进行验证以匹配特定版本的 ASP.NET。The value that you assign to this property is not validated to match a specific version of ASP.NET. 任何数值的值小于`4.0`(例如， `3.7`， `2.9`，或`2.0`) 被解释为`2.0`。Any numeric value smaller than `4.0` (for example, `3.7`, `2.9`, or `2.0`) is interpreted as `2.0`. 任何数字大于`4.5`解释为`4.5`。Any number larger than `4.5` is interpreted as `4.5`. 若要配置文件中设置此值，可以将值赋给`requestValidationMode`属性`httpRuntime`元素。To set this value in a configuration file, you can assign a value to the `requestValidationMode` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RequestValidationType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证 HTTP 请求的类型的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a type that is used to validate HTTP requests.

value.span: 处理请求验证任务的类型的名称。

span.span: The name of a type that handles request validation tasks.

value.span: 默认值为 ASP.NET 用于验证的 类型的完全限定名称。

span.span: The default is the fully qualified name of the type that ASP.NET uses for validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要自定义 ASP.NET 请求验证行为，可以创建继承自的类类型。To customize ASP.NET request validation behavior, you can create a class that inherits from the type. 在应用程序配置文件中，你将`requestValidationType`属性`httpRuntime`到自定义类型的完全限定的字符串名称的元素。In the configuration file for an application, you then set the `requestValidationType` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element to the fully qualified string name of the custom type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RequireRootedSaveAsPath { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文件名是否必须为完全限定的物理文件路径。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the file name must be a fully qualified physical file path.

value.span: 如果文件名必须为完全限定的物理文件路径，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the file name must be a fully qualified physical file path; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定是否文件名参数`SaveAs`方法必须是根的路径。The property specifies whether the file name argument to `SaveAs` methods must be a rooted path. ASP.NET 进程必须有权在指定位置中创建文件。The ASP.NET process must have permission to create files in the specified location. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法定义中保存类。For more information, see the save methods defined in the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SendCacheControlHeader { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 cache-control:private 标头是否作为 HTTP 响应的一部分来发送。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cache-control:private header is sent as part of the HTTP response.

value.span: 如果缓存的控件： 私有标头，则发送; 否则为。

span.span: if the cache-control:private header is to be sent; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将检查同时属性和属性来确定是否将发送`cache-control:private`在 HTTP 响应的标头。The class checks both the property and the property to determine whether to send the `cache-control:private` header in the HTTP response. 如果这两个属性设置为`false`，将不会发送标头。If either property is set to `false`, the header will not be sent. 如果将缓存控制标头设置为`private`，则客户端将不缓存中共享缓存的响应。When the cache-control header is set to `private`, then the client will not cache the response in a shared cache. 支持中的属性类提供的旧版应用程序的兼容性; 此属性是.NET Framework 2.0 版中过时。Support for the property in the class is provided for compatibility with legacy applications; this property is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class.

public: property TimeSpan ShutdownTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序终止前允许的空闲时间长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time the application is allowed to idle before it is terminated.

value.span: 一个 值，指示应用程序在终止前允许的空闲时间长度。

span.span: A value that indicates the length of time the application is allowed to idle before it is terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示应用程序正常关闭之前的时间量。The property indicates the amount of time before an application is shut down gracefully. 默认值为 90 秒。The default is 90 seconds. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TargetFramework { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置目标 .NET framework。

span.span: Gets or sets the target .NET framework.

value.span: 目标 .NET framework。

span.span: The target .NET framework.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseFullyQualifiedRedirectUrl { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否完全限定客户端重定向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the client-side redirects are fully qualified.

value.span: 如果完全限定客户端重定向，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if client-side redirects are fully qualified; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否完全限定客户端重定向 (窗体中http://server/path)或是否相对重定向改为发送到客户端。The property indicates whether client-side redirects are fully qualified (in the form http://server/path) or whether relative redirects are instead sent to the client. > [!NOTE] > 某些浏览器可能会遇到问题，在此值时的无 cookie 会话中加载页`false`。Some browsers might have problems loading pages in cookieless sessions when this value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int WaitChangeNotification { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置下一次更改通知前的等待时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the waiting time before the next change notification.

value.span: 下一次触发应用程序域重新启动的更改通知前的等待时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The waiting time, in seconds, before the next change notification that triggers an application domain to restart.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的值将超过的总时间，在部署过程中完成复制。A suggested value for would exceed the length of time to complete a copy during the deployment process. > [!NOTE] > 如果复制之后立即查看它并将部署过程，则可能会显示缓存内容。The content might appear cached if you view it immediately after a copy and deploy process. 这是典型的行为。This is typical behavior. 在你指定的等待期限过后，所做的更改生效。The changes take effect when the wait period that you specified has elapsed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#18)]
